remarks: Limit at the upper bound, of a continuous function defined on a left open right closed interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ioccncflimc.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
ioccncflimc.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ioccncflimc.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ioccncflimc.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A (,] B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ioccncflimc $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` B ) e. ( ( F |` ( A (,) B ) ) limCC B ) ) $.
